Hyundai Motor India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 02/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve The Un-audited Financial Results of the Company
(Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended December 312025.
